```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(fontawesome) # from github: https://github.com/rstudio/fontawesome

    htmltools.dir.version = FALSE,
    knitr.table.format = "html",
    knitr.kable.NA = '')

    warning = FALSE,
    message = FALSE,
    # Better figure resolution
    fig.retina = 3)
```

class: center 

# Many options for split panes

.leftcol[.left[
For 50-50 split panes, use:
```
.leftcol[
]
.rightcol[
]
```

For all other splits, use:
```
.leftcol#[
]
.rightcol#[
]
```
]]
.rightcol[.left[
Supported percentage splits:
```
.leftcol55[] .rightcol45[]
.leftcol60[] .rightcol40[]
.leftcol65[] .rightcol35[]
.leftcol70[] .rightcol30[]
.leftcol75[] .rightcol25[]
.leftcol80[] .rightcol20[]
```

Opposite splits are also supported 

(e.g. `.leftcol40[] .rightcol60[]`)
]]
